text: 15.11: FG 3.13-14Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap, mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani mba gumgi gum mbigi vhɨrve ndavi ga sav, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde Pairat ga suaŋrim, ana Zisas fhɨrɨ thari. Nde ana suaŋrim, ana Barabas fhɨrgirim, ana nde han zɨri.” Mbe maaŋ mbe suaŋgim, mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve khaŋ Pairat ga nzuai, “Ndu Barabas fhɨrgiri, ana nza han zɨri.”
